recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.cookingMethod: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through. Serve with lemon slices.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.cookingMethod: Cook pasta according to package directions. In a separate pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant. Add cream and Parmesan cheese and stir until cheese is melted and sauce is smooth. Add chicken and cooked pasta to the pan and toss to coat. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Pesto Pizza
recipes.cookingMethod: Preheat oven to 425°F. Spread pesto evenly over the pizza crust. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese, black olives, and sun-dried tomatoes. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until cheese is melted and crust is crispy. Slice and serve.
